problem.markdown: What revolutionary idea did the Hursti Hack prove? ( ) Holograms are now powerful enough to serve as personal devices. ( ) Personal computers are not as safe as we believe. (x) Electronic voting is easily altered. ( ) Fully electric, self-driving cars can be broken into more easily than older cars.
problem.p: What revolutionary idea did the Hursti Hack prove?

choicegroup.choice: Holograms are now powerful enough to serve as personal devices.
Personal computers are not as safe as we believe.
Fully electric, self-driving cars can be broken into more easily than older cars.
